name: Chase The Ace (Beta)
description:
THE CLASSIC CARD GAME

This game is a remastered version of the classic card game "chase the ace".

The goal is to never have the lowest card. If you don't have the lowest card you receive a point. If you do - you won't receive a point and lose your winning streak.

This is in development and will receive updates.

Bored? Try collecting the various achievements in the game!

Known Bugs: (Please also message me with any bugs)

Music toggle requires game restart.

Multiple points can be rewarded in one go.

CREDITS
